text: <@U25PYL3Q8> yes sir more likely, something "capture the click events from the deals and then build out a URL for the page you'd like the user to be redirected to" after click events it will  fetch deal information and display it on a CMS page sir

Hello everyone , I want to add custom video tag for every blog post.
Based on the docs I have used this code in blog post.
```{% video_player "embed_player" %}
{% video_player "embed_player" overrideable=False, type="scriptV4", hide_playlist=True, viral_sharing=False, embed_button=False, width="600", height="375", player_id="6178121750", style="", conversion_asset="{"type":"FORM","id":"9a77c63f-bee6-4ff8-9202-b0af020ea4b2","position":"POST"}" %}```
but for every blog post client should be able to choose the different video.

How can we make it dynamic. Thank you.
is there a way for blog posts functions to not show archived posts?
Yep, just be sure to offset that on mobile so that it doesn't overlap there. I think I've often either removed the negative margin, or added extra padding to the section below.
